item.title: 绿色氢气价格将在几十年内居高不下
item.description:

The gas will fail to reach price parity with conventionally made hydrogen in most regions, according to research firm BloombergNEF. 

】

item.title: 电子垃圾正在填满垃圾填埋场。如何减少电子垃圾？
item.description:
一年中产生的电子垃圾数量足以装满环绕赤道的卡车。【原文：

The amount of electronic waste generated in a year could fill enough trucks to encircle the equator.

item.title: 卢旺达在推动绿色能源发展中瞄准无处不在的汽油自行车
item.description: 卢旺达力图通过一项于 1 月 1 日生效的新政策，用更环保的替代品取代首都通常用作出租车的汽油自行车。【原文：Rwanda seeks to replace gasoline-fueled bikes that are typically used as taxis in its capital with greener alternatives through a new policy that takes effect on Jan. 1.】

item.title: 30 年期房贷并非为应对气候混乱而设计
item.description:

As house-demolishing weather becomes increasingly common, more Americans will find themselves without a safety net.

】

item.title: 梦想白色圣诞？这些社区等待已久
item.description:
对许多人来说，下雪的圣诞节是田园诗般的生活。以下是一些等待节日大雪已久的城市。【原文：

A snowy Christmas is idyllic for many. Here are cities that have waited a long time for holiday snow.

】

item.title: 阿尔卑斯山大雪引发雪崩风险，西班牙遭遇强风袭击
item.description: 圣诞节前，阿尔卑斯山部分地区大雪纷飞，而欧洲其他地区的大风天气也引发了天气警报。【原文：Snow blanketed parts of the Alps in the lead-up to Christmas, while windy conditions triggered weather alerts elsewhere in Europe.】

item.title: 禁止外国化石燃料融资计划在经合组织失败
item.description: 在美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普就职前几周，富裕国家就一项计划进行的会谈破裂，该计划将为石油和天然气项目提供数百亿美元的公共支持。【原文：Talks on a plan by wealthy nations to throttle tens of billions of dollars in public support for oil and gas projects have broken down without agreement, weeks before President-elect Donald Trump takes office.】

item.title: 澳大利亚维多利亚州丛林大火持续燃烧，火势失控
item.description: 当局周一表示，维多利亚州西部风景优美的格兰皮恩国家公园（Grampians National Park）附近的一场大火正继续向北蔓延，未来几天该地区的气温将有所上升。【原文：A large bushfire near the scenic Grampians National Park in western Victoria is continuing to push north, authorities said Monday, with temperatures in the region set to rise in coming days.】

item.title: 特朗普回国后，澳大利亚将推迟新的气候目标
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）重返白宫，澳大利亚到 2035 年减少碳排放的新目标预计将被推迟数月，很可能会推迟到 5 月举行的下届大选之后。【原文：Australia’s new targets for carbon emission cuts by 2035 are expected to be delayed by several months as a result of Donald Trump’s return to the White House, likely pushing them out beyond the next election which is due to be held by May.】

item.title: 对冲基金在 "艰难 "反弹后削减核技术风险敞口
item.description:
随着清洁能源需求的回升，基金经理对该行业的长期前景保持乐观态度。【原文：

】

item.title: 澳大利亚广播公司称，澳大利亚丛林大火可能在圣诞节加剧
item.description: 澳大利亚广播公司（Australian Broadcasting Corp）援引维多利亚州消防局（Country Fire Authority）的消息报道称，维多利亚州西部燃烧的大型丛林大火已失去控制，当局担心大火可能会在圣诞节和节礼日期间愈演愈烈。【原文：Large bushfires burning in western Victoria are burning out of control, and the authorities are concerned that they may intensify on Christmas Day and Boxing Day, the Australian Broadcasting Corp. reported, citing the Country Fire Authority.】

item.title: 拜登考虑对墨西哥太阳能组件实行关税减免
item.description: 拜登政府正在酝酿免除墨西哥进口太阳能设备的关税，这一最后时刻做出的改变将主要有利于 Maxeon 太阳能技术有限公司。【原文：The Biden administration is mulling exempting Mexico from tariffs on imported solar equipment, a last-minute change that would primarily benefit Maxeon Solar Technologies Ltd.】

item.description: 在这个节日里，气候界的科学家、政治家和商界领袖的愿望清单上有什么？是的，他们都希望在 2025 年对全球变暖采取更多行动。现在，他们中的许多人将会很高兴得到一些园艺用品和对地球友好的烹饪器具。请继续阅读。要无限量获取气候和能源新闻，请订阅 。【原文：What’s on the wish lists for scientists, politicians and business leaders across the climate community this holiday season ? item.title: 令人瞠目的成本让绿色氢能从炙手可热到黯然失色
item.description: 今年，由于成本下降的预期未能实现，一系列生产绿色氢气的项目被放弃。【原文：A raft of projects to produce green hydrogen, a fuel billed as critical to reaching net zero, have been abandoned this year as expectations for tumbling costs failed to materialize.】

item.title: 玛莎葡萄园附近的风电场获得拜登批准
item.description: 内政部批准了计划在马萨诸塞州海岸附近建造的 2.4 千兆瓦的 SouthCoast 风电场，这可能是即将卸任的乔-拜登总统批准的最后一个海上能源项目。【原文：The Interior Department approved the 2.4-gigawatt SouthCoast Wind farm planned near the Massachusetts coast, marking likely the last offshore energy project of its kind to win authorization under outgoing President Joe Biden.】

item.title: 美国向 Rivian 和 Plug 提供的贷款受到联邦关门的威胁
item.description: 由于美国政府可能关门，向 Rivian Automotive 公司、Plug Power 公司、PG&E 公司和其他公司提供的数十亿美元联邦贷款面临威胁。【原文：Billions of dollars in federal loans to Rivian Automotive Inc., Plug Power Inc., PG&E Corp. and other companies are under threat because of a potential US government shutdown.】

item.description: 英格兰银行的一项调查发现，即将出台的回收法规将使一些公司付出与工党提高工资税同样高的代价，并可能导致价格上涨。【原文：A Bank of England survey found that upcoming recycling regulations will cost some companies as much as Labour’s payroll tax hike and could result in higher prices.】

】

item.title: 石油行业游说特朗普使其免受关税和监管之苦
item.description: 石油行业的重量级人物正在游说当选总统唐纳德-特朗普即将上任的政府兑现承诺，通过提供更多钻井机会、减少环境法规以及使该行业免受关税影响来加强美国能源的主导地位。【原文：Oil industry heavyweights are lobbying President-elect Donald Trump’s incoming administration to make good on promises to bolster US energy dominance by offering more drilling opportunities, dialing back environmental regulations and insulating the sector from tariffs.】

item.title: 贝莱德减持旗舰可再生能源基金，全面改革领导者
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）表示，该公司正在减记其旗舰可再生基金之一的价值，因为该基金的两项关键投资崩盘，该公司正在从其最近收购的全球基础设施合作伙伴（Global Infrastructure Partners）业务中招募高管，以帮助扭转业绩。【原文：BlackRock Inc. said it’s writing down the value of one of its flagship renewable funds after two key investments for the vehicle collapsed, and it’s enlisting executives from its recently acquired Global Infrastructure Partners business to help turn around performance.】

item.title: 太阳能公司倒闭波及丹麦金融体系
